description: In a world of computing silos (from Google services to App Stores) there are many benefits… and many drawbacks.  Watch as Two open-source enthusiasts -- with differing views on the subject -- battle to the death (or at least have a reasoned debate, and maybe throw some insults) to determine if the ends justify the silo'd means, or if it's all PURE EVIL.  Imagine Thunderdome.  With a more believable premise.
title: Open Source Geeks in a World of Silos - Two Perspectives
